scripts.dev:prod: NODE_ENV=production VITE_GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) VITE_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version env-cmd -f .env.prod.env vite dev
scripts.dev:stage: NODE_ENV=production VITE_GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) VITE_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version env-cmd -f .env.stage.env vite dev
scripts.dev:local: NODE_ENV=production VITE_GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) VITE_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version env-cmd -f .env.local.env vite dev
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production VITE_GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) VITE_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version env-cmd -f .env.prod.env vite build --base=/vip/ && npm run package
scripts.build:stage: NODE_ENV=production VITE_GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) VITE_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version env-cmd -f .env.stage.env vite build --base=/vip/ && npm run package
scripts.build:local: NODE_ENV=production VITE_GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) VITE_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version env-cmd -f .env.local.env vite build --base=/vip/ && npm run package
scripts.test: npm run test:integration && npm run test:unit
scripts.upload:stage: yarn build:stage && aws-vault exec fe-dev -- aws s3 sync ./build s3://casino2-latest.fe-dev.infinitro.dev-274f856/vip && aws-vault exec fe-dev -- aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3CASE1RT1UEYC --paths '/*'
scripts.upload:prod: yarn build:prod && aws-vault exec fe-dev -- aws s3 sync ./build s3://casino2-latest.fe-dev.infinitro.dev-274f856/vip && aws-vault exec fe-dev -- aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3CASE1RT1UEYC --paths '/*'
